title: Barr burns Jets, Packers splurge & Charley Casserly joins the show!
itunes:title: Barr burns Jets, Packers splurge & Charley Casserly joins the show!
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal chat on Day 2 of the Free Agency Frenzy to discuss Anthony Barr going back to the Vikings (2:00) and CJ Mosley signing with the Jets (4:00). The guys are joined by NFL Media’s Charley Casserly (14:00) to get his thoughts on the latest free agency news. To close the show, the heroes discuss Teddy Bridgewater staying with the Saints (28:30), Sheldon Richardson to the Browns (46:20), Thomas Davis to the Chargers (49:25) and make a sandwich bet on Earl Thomas’ landing spot (54:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
